name: afoul
content:
run/fall afoul of something/someone
Add to word list
Add to word list
to experience problems, punishment, or harm because you do not obey a rule or disagree with a powerful organization, group, or person: He was 15 when he first ran afoul of the law. At one point Seeger fell afoul of the US government for his anti-war actions.
